viber.Location¶

class viber.Location(lat, lon)¶

Bases: viber.base.ViberObject

This object represents a point on the map.

lat¶

Latitude as defined by sender.

Type:float
lon¶

Longitude as defined by sender.

Type:float
Parameters:
  • lat (float) – Latitude as defined by sender.
  • lon (float) – Longitude as defined by sender.
